com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol

Interface Protocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProtocol, ZeroPointOne

    public interface Protocol
    Interface used for creating messages for server and parsing messages from server. Contains enum Protocol.Version with already implemented protocol versions. New enum element with protocol version and protocol class has to be added to Protocol.Version, when new protocol version is implemented.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
    See Also:
    com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty version
      Gets protocol version number property, that can be bound

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Protocol.Version
      Enum with implemented protocol versions.

      • buildAdapterMessage

        org.dom4j.Element buildAdapterMessage(Adapter adapter)
        Creates Dom4j XML document and element representing Adapter according to protocol version implemented in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter model with adapter information needed in protocol
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML element with adapter information

      • buildSensorMessage

        org.dom4j.Document buildSensorMessage(org.dom4j.Element rootElement,
                                      Sensor sensor)
        Creates Dom4j XML element representing Sensor according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. This element is attached to element given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        rootElement - root element for sensor element
        sensor - sensor model with sensor information needed in protocol
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML document with sensor information

      • buildRegisterMessage

        org.dom4j.Document buildRegisterMessage(AdapterController adapterController)
        Creates Dom4j XML document and element representing register message according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented
        Parameters:
        adapterController - class with information about Adapter and it's state needed for creating register message
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML document with register message

      • convertInMessageToXML

        org.dom4j.Document convertInMessageToXML(java.lang.String inMessage)
                                  throws org.dom4j.DocumentException
        Converts incoming message string to Dom4j document
        Parameters:
        inMessage - incoming message from server
        Returns:
        Dom4j document with parsed message
        Throws:
        org.dom4j.DocumentException - if message cannot be parsed as XML

      • parseInSensorMessage

        void parseInSensorMessage(org.dom4j.Document inDocument,
                          SensorController senderController,
                          AdapterController adapterController)
                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Parses message from server to sensor/actuator according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. Used for parsing messages in temporary communication thread ServerController
        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing response message from server
        senderController - controller of sensor, for which was message sent
        adapterController - controller of adapter, which own sensor
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - defined in implementation class
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.

      • parseInAdapterMessage

        void parseInAdapterMessage(org.dom4j.Document inDocument,
                           AdapterController adapterController)
                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses message from server to adapter according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. Used for parsing messages in permanent communication thread ServerReceiver
        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing message from server
        adapterController - controller of adapter, which received message
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - defined in implementation class
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.

      • checkProtocolVersion

        org.dom4j.Document checkProtocolVersion(org.dom4j.Document inDocument)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.lang.NullPointerException
        Parses message represented in Dom4j document and compares version number from message with version number of instance used to call this method
        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing message from server
        Returns:
        Dom4j document given as parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if version numbers are not equal
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.

      • getHexAdapterId

        java.lang.String getHexAdapterId(Adapter adapter)
        Returns string containing hexadecimal representation of adapter's ID set in Adapter model. Used in communication with server.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter model containing adapter ID
        Returns:
        string containing hexadecimal representation of adapter's ID

      • getHexSensorId

        java.lang.String getHexSensorId(Sensor sensor)
        Returns string containing hexadecimal representation of sensor's ID set in Sensor model. Used in communication with server.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor model containing sensor ID
        Returns:
        string containing hexadecimal representation of sensor's ID

      • getOffsetAsHexString

        java.lang.String getOffsetAsHexString(int offset)
        Returns string containing hexadecimal representation of value's offset. Used in communication with server.
        Parameters:
        offset - value's offset as integer number
        Returns:
        string containing hexadecimal representation of value's offset
